digest_items.title: Use security champions program
digest_items.why: Embedded security advocates improve security culture across teams
digest_items.fix: Designate security champions in each team and provide training

digest_items.title: Verify CORS configuration
digest_items.why: Misconfigured CORS can allow unauthorized cross-origin requests
digest_items.fix: Explicitly whitelist allowed origins instead of using '*'

digest_items.title: Implement zero trust architecture
digest_items.why: Zero trust assumes breach and verifies every access request
digest_items.fix: Require authentication for all resources regardless of network location

digest_items.title: Enable MFA for all admin accounts
digest_items.why: Multi-factor authentication prevents account takeover even if passwords are stolen
digest_items.fix: Use authenticator apps (Google Authenticator, Authy) or hardware keys (YubiKey)

digest_items.title: Enable audit logging
digest_items.why: Audit logs are essential for incident response and compliance
digest_items.fix: Log authentication events, data access, and configuration changes

digest_items.title: Review user access permissions
digest_items.why: Stale permissions from former employees pose security risk
digest_items.fix: Conduct quarterly access reviews and remove unnecessary permissions

digest_items.title: Implement secure software development lifecycle
digest_items.why: Security integrated throughout SDLC is more effective than bolt-on security
digest_items.fix: Include threat modeling, security reviews, and testing in each phase

digest_items.title: Implement disaster recovery plan
digest_items.why: Disasters and ransomware require tested recovery procedures
digest_items.fix: Document RTO/RPO, maintain offline backups, and test recovery quarterly
